nodes.text: Arno Xan was an Abednedo criminal who lived in the Anoat sector at the time of the Iron Blockade. Xan built a collection of stolen Imperial armors, which notably included a set of stormtrooper armor.
Xan joined the crew of the Smuggler, who dispatched the Abednedo on a variety of missions throughout the Anoat sector.
In the 2015 mobile video game Star Wars: Uprising, Arno Xan is one of the many crew members that can be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
